text: Stanisław Aleksy Tym (17 July 1937 - 6 December 2024) was a Polish movie director, screenwriter, dramatist and actor. Tym directed one movie Ryś in 2007. He was best known for his role Ryszard Ochódzki in cult polish movie Teddy Bear and two sequels: Controlled Conversations and Ryś. Tym was born in Małkinia Górna, Poland.
